LoomHosts wishes all LowEndTalk members a Happy Lunar New Year.

During the period of 15 days over the Lunar New Year, we'll be offering 50% off our VPS plans over at <a href="http://LoomHosts.com">LoomHosts.com</a>. Use the following code "CNY2012VPS"! Check out our promo page  <a href="http://loomhosts.com/promos/newyear.php">here!</a>

During the promotional period, you'd be able to get the following plan which is usually $13.99 at a price of $6.99, which is currently under the Low End Box standards!
Starter VPS

Feel free to contact us over Live Support at <a href="http://LoomHosts.com">LoomHosts.com</a> if you have any queries.

<strong>About Us</strong>
We've started out as a small VPS company that stayed mostly quiet in the community in July 2011, but were capable of keeping close relationships with clients. Due to this, we've been able to provide close support with them and still be able to meet our overhead costs.

<strong>Update on the Singapore VPS Situation</strong>
I know people are pretty eager to test out the Singapore VPS's as well. All I can say at this point is, it's nearly ready, but not fully ready [yet]. This is due to the situation on the lack of IP Addresses and Network Bandwidth. It's currently only able to push about 66Mbps despite being on a 100Mbps uplink port. [Hopefully] it would be ready by March - April.
